Nahetu
Piṭṭhiduka
Dassanenapahātabbaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
3.
4062Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho. (1)
4063Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  (yāva asaññasattā) uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
